attr.title: A Key(s) Path
attr.desc: Build your way with your own keys. Your 3 movement keys (Left, Right, Jump) are available at the bottom of the screen; you can drag them in the world to use as platforms. But don't use too many, or you could run out of movement options!
attr.inst: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, Geegaz! https://geegaz.itch.io/out-of-controls
attr.inst_md: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, [Geegaz](https://geegaz.itch.io/out-of-controls)!
